item.title: Flip - Essence 01
item.description: In this project I wanted to dig a bit deeper into Flip simulations in Houdini. I am using the SOP Flip workflow and I must say that I really like it, quite quick and intuitive to setup. The glass is modeled in Houdini based on the Essence tumbler by Iittala. The fruit and woodboard are megascans.
